title: Start
body:
You've killed the dangerous beasts ahead! Well done.
[[ It was easy. |Yes]] 
[[ I suddenly don't want to talk to you anymore. |No]]
[[ Why are there crabs in the forest? |mid1]]

title: Yes
body:
You can enter the portal ahead to meet the Forest Witch. She will teach you well.
[[ Thank you. |Yes2]] 
[[ Will I finally learn magic? |Yes2]]

title: mid1
body:
Don't question it.
[[ Alright... |Yes]] 
[[ This place is weird. |Yes]]
